resources.string: Modal Time
Learn and measure how speed you are with different kind of interaction.
name
Choose order of interactions (between 1 and 4)
Voice Control
Head Gesture Recognition
Finger Touch Gesture
SmartWatch (ControlWear)
Validate
Error: name must be at least 3 characters length
Error: some values are out of range, must be between 1 and 4
Error: some values are identical, must be different
Timing Icon
Start at 10 and move to 16 by passing through 7, 1, 14
Finger Touch
Head Gesture
Voice Control
Smart Watch
Any kind of Interaction
Origami diagram (one step)
Any kind of interaction you want
Use your finger to swipe RIGHT on screens (3 times).
Use your finger to swipe LEFT on screens (3 times).
Use your finger to swipe FORWARD on screens (3 times).
Use your finger to swipe BACKWARD on screens (3 times).
Make a little tilt RIGHT with you head (3 times).
Make a little tilt LEFT with you head (3 times).
Make a little nod UP with you head (3 times).
Make a little nod DOWN with you head (3 times).
Use your finger to swipe RIGHT on the smartwatch (3 times).
Use your finger to swipe LEFT on the smartwatch (3 times).
Use your finger to swipe FORWARD on the smartwatch (3 times).
Use your finger to swipe BACKWARD on the smartwatch (3 times).
You can use your voice too, say "Next" (3 times).
You can use your voice too, say "Previous" (3 times).
You can use your voice too, say "Ok" (3 times).
You can use your voice too, say "Cancel" (3 times).
Use any kind of interaction you want to go RIGHT (3 times).
Use any kind of interaction you want to go LEFT (3 times).
Use any kind of interaction you want to go UP (3 times).
Use any kind of interaction you want to go DOWN (3 times).
